testcase.classname: Login to Cirrus Connected Mobile App
testcase.name: User logged in to cirrus application with valid credentails
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sign in page...............................................passed When User enter username conaircraftnhltestuser1@gmail.com and password cirrus005.passed And User submit the details.................................................passed Then User should "be succesfully" logged in to application..................passed

testcase.name: User invites existing user with new aircraft access
testcase.system-out: When User log out from the application......................................passed Given User is already logged in to application by username nihilentqa15@gmail.com ,Password cirrus12.passed Given User is on My Hangar screen...........................................passed Given User is on Manage users screen........................................passed When User submit details of additional user firstname test ,lastname test,emailnihilentautomation@gmail.com,airctaftFHA762OIW.passed And Invited user nihilentautomation@gmail.com is present under list of invited users for Aircraft FHA762OIW.passed

testcase.name: User verifies user got an access to invited aircraft
testcase.system-out: When User log out from the application......................................passed Given User is already logged in to application by username nihilentautomation@gmail.com ,Password cirrus001.passed Given User is on My Hangar screen...........................................passed When User has access to FHA762OIW aircraft..................................passed

testcase.name: User deletes invited user for given aircraft
testcase.system-out: When User log out from the application......................................passed Given User is already logged in to application by username nihilentqa15@gmail.com ,Password cirrus12.passed Given User is on My Hangar screen...........................................passed Given User is on Manage users screen........................................passed When User deletes invited user nihilentautomation@gmail.com access for aircarft FHA762OIW.passed

testcase.name: User verifies access is removed for invited aircraft
testcase.system-out: When User log out from the application......................................passed Given User is already logged in to application by username nihilentautomation@gmail.com ,Password cirrus001.passed Given User is on My Hangar screen...........................................passed
